post.description:
Send password reset OTP to email.
Uses Supabase's recovery OTP flow instead of redirect links.

Reset password using OTP verification.
Verifies the OTP code from the recovery email and sets new password.

get.description:
Check if a username is available.

Args:
    username (str): Username to check
    
Returns:
    dict: {"available": bool}

post.description:
Change user password.
Requires current password verification.

Request email change.
Sends verification email to new address.

Logout current session.
Invalidates the current JWT token.

get.description:
Get all active sessions for the current user.
Note: Supabase doesn't expose session listing in the client SDK.
This is a placeholder that returns the current session info.

delete.description:
Terminate a specific session.
Note: Supabase doesn't support terminating specific sessions via client API.
This endpoint logs out the user if they try to terminate current session.

Terminate all sessions for the user.
This signs out the user globally using Supabase.
Delete a project and its associated resources.

get.description:
Get all jobs and their renders for a project.
Optimized to reduce database calls and use non-blocking async operations.

schema.title: Response Get Project Jobs Api V1 Projects  Project Id  Jobs Get

post.description:
Manually trigger batch processing of the waiting queue.
Protected by API key (check env).

Apply a Bria editing tool to an image.

This endpoint queues a job to apply one of the free Bria tools:
- bria/remove-background
- bria/blur-background
- bria/bria-3.2-vector
- bria/enhance
- bria/erase-foreground

get.description: Get featured public projects.
Get trending public projects (ordered by views/likes).
Get recent public projects.

Get a user's public projects.
By default, only returns completed projects (status='done').
Set include_drafts=true to include all projects.

post.description: Like a project.

get.description: Check if user has liked a project.

post.description:
Record a view on a project.
Increments view count for public/unlisted projects.

get.description:
Get a public project by ID.
Also works for unlisted projects if the link is known.
Optimized to fetch all data in a single query.

post.description:
Delete multiple projects at once.
Only deletes projects owned by the requesting user.

get.description:
Get a paginated list of public templates.

- **page**: Page number (starting from 1)
- **limit**: Number of items per page (max 100)
- **category**: Filter by category (optional)
- **sort**: Sort order - trending, recent, or featured
- **search**: Search in template titles (optional)

post.description: Vote on a template (upvote/downvote).

get.description:
Get the most popular template categories with their counts.
Returns up to 10 categories sorted by count.

schema.title: Response Get Popular Categories Api V1 Templates Categories Get

get.description:
Get the comprehensive list of available template categories.
Used for dropdowns and filters.

schema.title: Response Get All Categories Api V1 Templates List Get

get.description:
Get templates directly from templates.json file.
This endpoint reads from the JSON file directly for immediate updates.

Get a single template by its ID.
Returns full template details including prompt information.

patch.description: Update a template. Only the owner can update.

delete.description:
Delete a template. Only the owner can delete.
This performs a soft delete by marking the template as private.

post.description:
Create a new template directly.
The template will be immediately published as public.

Sync official templates from templates.json to the database.
This is an admin-only endpoint protected by API key.

Publish an existing project as a public template.
Only the project owner can publish it.

get.description:
Get public projects that were remixed from this template.
Returns a list of simplified project objects with thumbnail URLs.

schema.title: Response Get Template Remixes Api V1 Templates  Template Id  Remixes Get

post.description:
Create a copy of a template for the current user.
This creates a new project based on the template's configuration.

Upload a thumbnail image for a template.
Only the template owner can upload a thumbnail.

get.description: Get information about all available models.

schema.title: Response Get Available Models Api V1 Jobs  Job Id  Models Get

get.description: List user assets with pagination and filtering.

parameters.name: type

schema.title: Type

parameters.description: Filter by asset type (e.g., selfie, ref)

get.description:
Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information.
Uses fallback data from authentication if users table is not accessible.

put.description:
Update the authenticated user's profile information.
- Bio is limited to 180 characters (Instagram's 150 + 30 extra)
- Username can only be changed once every 30 days

post.description: Upload a profile picture image for the user.

get.description: Get user preferences. Creates default preferences if none exist.
Search users by username or full name.

schema.title: Response Search Users Api V1 Users Search Get

get.description: Get a user's public profile by username.
Get a user's public profile by ID.

post.description: Follow a user.

post.description: Block a user.

get.description: Get all available subscription plans.

schema.title: Response Get Plans Api V1 Billing Plans Get

get.description: Get user's current subscription details.
Get user's billing history.

post.description:
Subscribe to a plan.
Note: This is a placeholder. In production, integrate with Stripe or another payment provider.
Cancel subscription at end of billing period.

get.description: Get or create user's referral code.

post.description:
Apply a referral code (during signup or first use).
Rewards both the referrer and the referred user.

get.description: Get referral statistics.
Get referral rewards history.

Validate a referral code (no authentication required).
Used during signup to check if a referral code is valid.
Get list of users referred by the current user.

post.description:
Request a full data export.
Queues a background job to compile user data.
Returns immediately with a request_id.

Rate Limit: 1 request per hour to prevent resource exhaustion.

get.description:
Check data export status.
Returns the latest export request status.

Get the download URL for the data export file.
Rate Limit: 10 downloads per hour.

post.description: Submit a support ticket.
Submit a bug report.

get.description: Get all support tickets for the current user.

schema.title: Response Get My Tickets Api V1 Support Tickets Get

get.description:
Get frequently asked questions.
Optionally filter by category.
Get available FAQ categories.

List available generation models and tools from models.json.

Args:
    tier: Filter by tier ("free", "pro", "all")
    category: Filter by category ("tool", None for models, "all" for both)
    include_tools: Whether to include editing tools in response
    include_experimental: Whether to include user's imported experimental models
    imagine: Filter by imagine capability
    copy: Filter by copy capability
    design: Filter by design capability
List available quality levels.

post.description: Calculate credits needed for a model and quality combination.

get.description: Check ImageRouter account status and credits.

post.description: Enhance a prompt using Groq (openai/gpt-oss-120b).

schema.title: Response List Tools Api V1 Tools  Get

get.description: Get current usage for all tools for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response Get Tool Usage Api V1 Tools Usage Get

get.description: Get current usage for a specific tool.

post.description:
Process an image with a specified tool.

This endpoint:
1. Checks the user's daily usage limit for the tool
2. Processes the image using the appropriate AI model
3. Returns the processed image URL

Upload an image file and process it with the specified tool.
Alternative to process endpoint for direct file uploads.

get.description:
